title: Ghost game? WTF???
body:
I went into a game.
6 minutes in I am going to the enemy's blue side to invade.
I begin autoattacking the gromp.

"Attempting to Reconnect"
I figure it's my internet again. I turn around to check my router; port 4 blinking white, it's working. I am still connected to the internet.
I wait 30 seconds. I figure it must be something with my machine.

So I ALT + F4.

And I am back at the home screen of the client.

GHOST GAME? WHAT JUST HAPPENED?

replies.body: Yea that might have been a ghost game if it's not letting you attempt to reconnect. Keep in mind that if the entire game crashed altogether, none of the players will get any penalties from it.

I check op.gg for my live match. it still says I am in-game.
What is going on? I am in a different lobby now.
